content: Can someone tell me any real Electronic health record that is present on FHIR server, that I can download? I want to predict hospital readmission from such data.
You won't be able to download 'real' data from any server without having specific authorization to access that data - real information is, of course, sensitive and protected.
Kindly tell any electronic health data on FHIR server on which I can do hospital readmission, even if it's not real. Are all data on FHIR synthesized for researchers?
Synthea produces synthetic data, but it would not be helpful for training algorithms - because the data itself is algorithmically produced and thus isn't going to reflect 'real' data.
